array.sentence: I mean, okay, imagine that I am. So what? We've never had a lower crime rate than right now. Brea can finally come home from work at night withoug being terrified of getting attacked or raped or some even more fucked up shit.

array.sentence: I am! You're a white dude, you're just worried about feds watching your dirty internet history. Brea and I, we're safer since everyone's been implanted, really.

array.sentence: Do not bring this up.

array.sentence: I will, and you know what? He would still be here if this guy had a preventive implant that had called the cops when he started drunk driving.
